title: Affordable big apartment available for rent 19147
description:
2 bedroom railroad style apartment located on the 3rd floor in a classic Philly rowhome. Washer and dryer in unit. Large kitchen with great natural light and gas stove. Hardwood floors throughout the apt with radiator heat. Separate living room. The two bedrooms are connected by a door, but they are both individually accessible too. First bedroom is currently set up as an office, and features a large closet, but could easily fit a queen bed. Second bedroom is very large, the bed in the pics is a cali king and there's plenty of additional space for a small desk and has 1 very large closet and 1 smaller closet. The room has amazing natural light. Generally the apartment has ample storage. Located in the desirable Queen Village neighborhood with tons of restaurants, bars, and nightlife. Hardware store is downstairs and dry cleaner across the street, and multiple groceries and coffee shops within a very close radius. Right off South St which makes for an easy walk to Old City, Italian Market, and Center City.
1 year lease required.

title: Brand new 3 bedroom townhome for rent!!!
description:
WELCOME HOME to this amazing BRAND NEW CONSTRUCTION townhome! This home was just completed and is so beautifully constructed - you must see it in person to appreciate the care put into it.
When you open the front door you will love the flow of this open floorplan unit. From the living room you will enter the separate formal dining space which overlooks the family room and kitchen. The kitchen features all brand new stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, an island, garbage disposal and pendant lighting over the island (which was added after photos were taken). The oversized sliding doors let tons of sunlight into the family room and kitchen and offer an entrance to the rear deck. You will also find a half bath, closet, and the garage off the side of the dining room. Moving upstairs, you will love the space in the primary bedroom! Featuring an amazing oversized walk in closet which is big enough to be a bedroom, and a large primary bathroom. Down the hall is the second full bathroom, a laundry room with brand new washer and dryer, and then two good sized bedrooms. Although not pictured, there are ceiling fans with lights in each bedroom.
There is a full, unfinished basement which is waterproofed and ready to use for storage, a home gym, or whatever you need! There is an egress window in the basement for safety. Washer, dryer, and refrigerator are not pictured but brand new appliances are being installed on Monday, 6/27. Blinds will also be installed on all windows. The landlord will allow 1 pet for additional rent and a pet deposit. (50 lb weight limit).
The property is close to many major highways, Norristown Farm Park, Einstein Hospital, trails for recreation, and so much more! Shopping and public transportation is a breeze from this community as well. You can be the first to live in this beautiful brand new townhome - don't hesitate, reach out today to confirm your appointment. Must meet minimum credit score of 680 and total combined income must be at least 3x the monthly rent.

description: Welcome Home to this beautiful center hall Colonial located on a corner lot with side entry garage! Enter through the foyer with detailed marble flooring, large open staircase with crown molding.  Head into the large oversized living room and you will find the original hardwood flooring, wood burning brick fireplace with mantle and crown molding throughout. As you enter into the conservatory there are two sets of beautiful French doors. Plenty of natural sunlight fill this room with the wall of windows. A brick fireplace with mantle is the perfect focal point.  The kitchen is gorgeous with the Corian countertop, soft closing cabinets and stainless steel appliances. The enormous island makes food prep easy. The detailed marble flooring continues throughout this room. The dining room with built -ins is a perfect place for family dinners. The enclosed porch is a quiet place to have your morning coffee. As you head upstairs you will notice the large/wide stairs. Each landing with beautiful windows and crown molding. Enter into the master suite with original hardwood floors, full master bath that continues with detailed marble flooring and walls. This level has two more generous size bedrooms with original hardwood flooring. The main bath with ceramic tile and a jetted tub make this level complete. Continue upstairs to bedrooms 4 and 5. These bedrooms are nice sized and continue with the original flooring. Head downstairs to the fully finished basement. The opportunities are endless, the main space is perfect for entertaining or family gatherings. The two finished rooms are great for a office and a play room. An impeccably maintained house with great curb appeal and a lovely front porch. There is a pocket door off the living room with a bonus room that can be used as an office, craft room or playroom (your choice) and this secret room includes plenty of built-in cabinets for extra storage. Upstairs you will find new carpet throughout, 2 additional bedrooms with plenty of closet space, a lovely main bath with laminate plank flooring and a full laundry room. The stunning oversized primary bedroom is so tranquil. The vaulted ceilings accent this bedroom retreat, along with the large windows, roomy walk-in closet and private bath. title: featuring 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and 4 total levels!!
description: Mechanic St,  ATTENTION! Amazing opportunity in one of South Jersey's hottest markets.  You've waited years to become a home owner and here's your chance to secure a massive, 2,000+ square foot victorian style twin home, 15 years young, featuring 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and 4 total levels of unique living space.  Swedesboro is a nationally recognized location known for offering a superior balance of affordability, things to do, and excellent schools.  You get all of that of more when you consider 6 Mechanic St.  Pulling up to the residence, it's an instant "wow".  This home has impressive curb appeal and looks even better in person.  A large front porch is your first stop, it's the perfect place to enjoy cool mornings with your favorite warm beverage.  Entering through the front door places you in the foyer and family room.  This space presents excellently, the colors and decor are spot on and before you see the rest of the home you'll already know this is the one.  Moving through the family room takes you past the staircase and into the bright and open eat-in kitchen.  If you love to cook, you'll love the opportunities this kitchen provides with useful storage and work space.  Highlights include a large built in pantry, 42 inch cabinets, large island and generous counter space, matching appliances (gas cooking) and plenty of natural light.  With its size, this kitchen and dining area has the potential to be the heart of your home and you'll cherish every memory shared here. At the rear of the first floor is an attractive half bathroom and rear exit.  Moving downstairs into the basement gives access to two unfinished rooms, one currently used for storage and a second utilized as a home gym.  Either space has the potential to be finished and used as a gaming room, music studio, home theater, additional living space or any use that suits your needs.  Moving back upstairs and up to the second floor gives access to two bedrooms, the laundry area, and a full bathroom.  Your immediate impression will again be how well these rooms show.  These bedrooms could be great kids rooms, a home office, guest room, or whatever setup best suits your needs.  Moving up to the 3rd floor places you in the owner's suite.  This is a whole floor dedicated to the head(s) of household.  Best features include a large landing with two closets, an oversized bathroom, and oversized bedroom.  All of this is for your enjoyment and this will be your sanctuary from the outside world.  In total these four floors give flexibility in use not seen in comparable homes or townhomes.  Moving outside, there's a large driveway and nicely sized backyard for your enjoyment.  For those with a need for more outdoor space there's also plenty of open space at nearby Locke Ave Park.  Everything about this home is as desirable as it is unique and you must act fast.  These rare opportunities do not last long and belong to the decisive.  The current owners have lovingly cared for this home for the last few years and their growing needs are taking them in a new direction.  It's now your turn and we can't wait for you to set your appointment and see everything this home has to offer. For more information and pictures call 🏠 ☎️   show contact info

title: Fitler Square - Bi-Level 1 Bedroom in Gated Courtyard
description:
INCREDIBLE UNIT! This newer construction one-bedroom, one-bath bi-level apartment in FITLER SQUARE has hardwood floors and all modern amenities (including in-unit washer/dryer). This unit is located in a secure, gated and landscaped courtyard in Fitler Square. You enter from the courtyard through your own private entrance into the first floor open living room/kitchen space with recessed lighting. The kitchen includes a peninsula with seating for four, granite countertops, subway tile backsplash and stainless steel appliances - including a five-burner gas range/oven, microwave, refrigerator, dishwasher and garbage disposal. Upstairs you will find a large bedroom with ample closet storage and ceiling fan, washer/dryer, linen closet and bathroom with full-size tub/shower, granite top vanity and subway tiles. The apartment has central air/heat (with a programmable thermostat that you control). The gated courtyard is located on quiet, tree-lined Naudain Street, and is steps away from two supermarkets (including the new Giant Heirloom Market), an Amazon Locker and all the shops and restaurants/bars of Fitler Square and nearby Rittenhouse Square, as well as being within easy walking distance of both Penn and Drexel, the South Street Bridge and Schuylkill Banks Park. There is a designated bike storage area in the rear section of the courtyard, as well as garbage and recycling containers so that you don't need to store these in your unit. Rent is $1,675 per month plus utilities, and the unit is available starting August 1, 2022. Please email or call Brian at  show contact info
to schedule a showing. Apologies, but no dogs or cats are permitted and this is a smoke free property.

title: Sunny 2 Bed Town House With Patio & Garden
description:
Beautifully 2 bedroom house for rent in the convenient East Falls area. Two block from train and next to Manayunk. 15 minutes drive from Philadelphia city centre. Hardwood floors throughout house. The kitchen is well equipped with dishwasher, fridge, gas cooker, garbage
disposal & microwave and breakfast bar; The Washer & Dryer is conveniently located on the second floor next to the bedrooms.  The bedrooms have plenty of storage space with large built in closets and additional storage space off the bedrooms also.  Small finished basement. Gas heat. New double glazed windows throughout. House has good size garden and rear yard ideal for BBQs and sitting out. Very quiet Block with decent street parking. Water bills included. Available August 3rd.
East Falls is one of the few Philadelphia communities with a direct connection to the Schuylkill River and Fairmount Park. There are a ton of things to enjoy! Lovely pocket parks complement the recreation available on the loop edging the river drives. Plus, East Falls boasts great restaurants with music and entertainment for adults; story time for children and diverse programs for adults at the local library; two parks, two recreation centers, play areas, art programs, festivals, and even a fabulous community theater pulls East Falls together throughout the year!
